tool.name: save_progress
tool.description: Save a progress checkpoint to disk for scan resumption or tracking. Use this to save intermediate results, findings, or state that should persist.

parameters.parameter: Name for this checkpoint (e.g., "recon_complete", "auth_testing_done", "phase_1"). Should be descriptive and unique within the scan.
Progress data to save. Can include: - findings: List of discovered vulnerabilities or issues - state: Current scan state (e.g., tested endpoints) - context: Any relevant context for resumption
Optional metadata about the checkpoint: - phase: Current scan phase - agent_id: ID of the agent saving progress - description: Human-readable description

tool.returns: Status object with checkpoint file path and creation time.

tool.name: load_progress
tool.description: Load a previously saved progress checkpoint. Use this to resume a scan or retrieve previous findings.

parameters.parameter: Name of the checkpoint to load.

tool.returns: The checkpoint data including saved data and metadata, or error if not found.

tool.name: list_progress
tool.description: List all available progress checkpoints for the current scan. Use this to see what checkpoints exist before loading.
tool.returns: List of available checkpoints with their names, creation times, and file sizes.
